title: Know Your Limits: 2013's Tax Thresholds Rise With Inflation
summary: Federal taxes are climbing for many folks in 2013. But thanks to inflation adjustments, so too are some key tax thresholds. You can now save more for retirement, make larger gifts without worrying about the gift tax and even pay a little less tax on your children's investment gains. Here are some key changes:
